desc: We are your premier gift shop in Atlanta focusing on handmade and local products made by artists and craftsmen right here in the Atlanta Georgia area. We have a wide range of gifts for you. Order online or visit us in Midtown, at the heart of Atlanta. The local neighborhood, best gift shop.

layout.text: We are EcoDenizen. Midtown Atlanta's neighborhood gift shop.
Eco Denizen is a local family-owned business derived from the idea that products and services can be both better for people and planet.
